attributes.comment:
I would like to register my opposition to this fee increase.
It will place an undue strain on the already financially burdensome task of
adoption. Families who are adopting are already frequently overextended
financially, often borrowing money just to be able to give a child a home. Many
are already in debt because of having paid for failed fertility treatments which are
not covered by insurance. Asking them to shoulder even more expense to put a
child in their empty arms is too painful to think about.
Most importantly, it could prevent children who need a home from being able to go
to one, as the parent may deem the process unaffordable. Please do not allow
this to happen.
Thank you very much for your consideration
Alice Simmons
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Alice Simmons
